verses.text: Now the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* had a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H6099"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w* of \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*: and when they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, that, behold, the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add was\add* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*;

The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and to \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and unto the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Ataroth|strong="H5852"\w*, and \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*, and \w Nimrah|strong="H5247"\w*, and \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and \w Elealeh|strong="H0500"\w*, and \w Shebam|strong="H7643"\w*, and \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, and \w Beon|strong="H1194"\w*,\f + \fr 32.3 \ft Nimrah: also called, Beth-nimrah\f*\f + \fr 32.3 \ft Shebam: also called, Shibmah\f*\f + \fr 32.3 \ft Beon: also called, Baal-meon\f*

\add Even\add* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add is\add* a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* have \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*:

Wherefore, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, if we have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, let this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* for a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, \add and\add* bring us not \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, Shall your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and shall ye \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* here?

And wherefore discourage \w ye|strong="H5106"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from going \w over|strong="H5674"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them?\f + \fr 32.7 \ft discourage: Heb. break\f*

Thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, when I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* them from \w Kadesh-barnea|strong="H6947"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

For when they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Eshcol|strong="H0812"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, they \w discouraged|strong="H5106"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that they should not \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them.

And the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, and he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Surely|strong="H0518"\w* none of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, unto \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and unto \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; because they have not \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* me:\f + \fr 32.11 \ft wholly…: Heb. fulfilled after me\f*

Save \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w* the \w Kenezite|strong="H7074"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*: for they have \w wholly|strong="H4390"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and he made them \w wander|strong="H5128"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, until all the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, that had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, was \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*.

And, behold, ye are risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in your \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* stead, an \w increase|strong="H8635"\w* of \w sinful|strong="H2400"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, to \w augment|strong="H5595"\w* yet the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* toward \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For if ye turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, he will yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* them in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; and ye shall \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ And they came \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w sheepfolds|strong="H1448"\w* here for our \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for our little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*:

But we \w ourselves|strong="H0587"\w* will go \w ready|strong="H2363"\w* \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, until we have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them unto their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: and our little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

We will not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto our \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, until the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w inherited|strong="H5157"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

For we will not \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* with them on yonder \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, or \w forward|strong="H1973"\w*; because our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H0935"\w* to us on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If ye will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, if ye will go \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w*,

And will \w go|strong="H5674"\w* all of you \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, until he hath driven \w out|strong="H3423"\w* his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him,

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* be \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: then \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and be \w guiltless|strong="H5355"\w* before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and before \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

But if ye will not do \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, behold, ye have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and be \w sure|strong="H3045"\w* your \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* will find you \w out|strong="H4672"\w*.

\w Build|strong="H1129"\w* you \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and \w folds|strong="H1448"\w* for your \w sheep|strong="H6792"\w*; and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* that which hath \w proceeded|strong="H3318"\w* out of your \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w commandeth|strong="H6680"\w*.

Our little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, our \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, our \w flocks|strong="H4735"\w*, and all our \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, shall be there in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*:

But thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* will pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, every man \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* for \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, as my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w saith|strong="H1696"\w*.

So concerning them \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, If the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* will pass with you \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, every man \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you; then ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* for a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*:

But if they will not pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* with you \w armed|strong="H2502"\w*, they shall have \w possessions|strong="H0270"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* you in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, As the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, so will we \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

We \w will|strong="H5168"\w* pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, that the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of our \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add may be\add* ours.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto them, \add even\add* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, and unto \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, with the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof in the \w coasts|strong="H1367"\w*, \add even\add* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.
¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and \w Ataroth|strong="H5852"\w*, and \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*,
And Atroth, \w Shophan|strong="H5855"\w*, and \w Jaazer|strong="H3270"\w*, and \w Jogbehah|strong="H3011"\w*,\f + \fr 32.35 \ft Jaazer: also called, Jazer\f*

And \w Beth-nimrah|strong="H1039"\w*, and \w Beth-haran|strong="H1028"\w*, \w fenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*: and \w folds|strong="H1448"\w* for \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.\f + \fr 32.36 \ft Beth-nimrah: also called, Nimrah\f*
And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and \w Elealeh|strong="H0500"\w*, and \w Kirjathaim|strong="H7156"\w*,

And \w Nebo|strong="H5015"\w*, and \w Baal-meon|strong="H1186"\w*, (their \w names|strong="H8034"\w* being \w changed|strong="H4142"\w*,) and \w Shibmah|strong="H7643"\w*: and \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* other \w names|strong="H8034"\w* unto the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which they \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*.\f + \fr 32.38 \ft gave…: Heb. they called by names the names of the cities\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w dispossessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w* which \add was\add* in it.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* unto \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; and he \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* therein.

And \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* the small \w towns|strong="H2333"\w* thereof, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them \w Havoth-jair|strong="H2334"\w*.

And \w Nobah|strong="H5025"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w Kenath|strong="H7079"\w*, and the \w villages|strong="H1323"\w* thereof, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* it \w Nobah|strong="H5025"\w*, after his own \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
